attributes.additional_details: So people who are neither male or female can have a bathroom that they are entirely comfortable going into.
attributes.background: Instead of only having male and female bathrooms in public places, build bathrooms for non-binary people to use as well.

rejection.details:
The provision of public toilets is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide local authorities with funding to provide non-binary toilets.
